title.rendered: RHINO BAR SUIT FORD RANGER* 2012-2015 PX1

content.rendered:
THE FORD RANGER EVOLUTION FRONT REPLACEMENT WINCH BAR IS HERE!

The new and exciting Evolution front replacement winch bar is available for order now. These new bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 rated recovery points, industry leading angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing slightly textured black Powder coat as standard and can be colour coded as an option. It is a 3mm and 5mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black and can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are an option on many other brands.

-The Evolution bumper has carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated imported Foglights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned in stainless steel

Winch

Spotlight bar

Shackles

Spotlights

* FORD RANGER is a trade mark of Ford Australia

excerpt.rendered: Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
